channel.title: Artificial-Intelligence on thingsithinkithink
channel.description: Recent content in Artificial-Intelligence on thingsithinkithink

item.title: Open Models in 2024: Progress and Challenges
item.description: I recently watched a talk from LatentSpace Live (NeurIPS 2024) by Luca Soldaini a research scientist at the AI Institute, on the state of open models in 2024. His reflections on how far we’ve come—and the challenges ahead—offer a good perspective on where AI might be heading.

item.title: Off-the-Radar AI Gems for the End of the Year
item.description: As 2024 wraps up, I wanted to share a few things that have been shaping my thinking recently. These aren’t the headline grabbers—more like hidden gems that have influenced how I approach and think about AI. Hopefully, there’s something here that sparks your curiosity too.
